game.name: Thief vs Cops
game.description:
There a time comes in your life when you have to decide if you are with a good person or a bad guy. In Thief Vs Cops game, you would have to decide whether you want to chase down the lawbreakers or fun from the cop. Does it sound interesting enough? Join this brand new car game and be prepared to race through a unique track while looking forward to complete your mission! Try to avoid other vehicles otherwise your car gets crashed immediately! 
The more you stay in the game, the higher score would be seen on the screen. Do not get relaxed for a single second as cops consider you criminals and they will keep chasing until they catch you. Try to maintain a proper distance from them to survive as long as possible! Make sure to grab the benison you see on your way and implement the turbo to increase the speed of your car. These cops are of different types and they would leave a trail of acid so stay away them to keep you safe. 
The money you collect on your would help to purchase new cars and help you become unstoppable in future. See on the top left corner of the screen to check your survival time in this cute html5 driving game! All the best to become a top escaper in this car avoiding game! We have plenty of engaging and interesting options to play online for free without download. Browse through our extensive website to spot the best car games!
